attributes.action: To make nonbinary a legal recognised gender on legal documents.
attributes.additional_details: I am a nonbinary person and I find it distressing always having to be called male or female legally.
attributes.background: I want the many gender identitys to be recognised like nonbinary and genderfluid.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Legally recognise Non-Binary as a gender
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700312
